mapper.select: select u.user_id, u.user_name, u.nick_name, u.email, u.phone_number, u.sex, u.avatar, u.password, u.status, u.login_ip, u.login_date, u.remark, u.create_by, u.create_time, u.update_by, u.update_time, r.role_id, r.role_name from sys_user u left join sys_user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id left join sys_role r on ur.role_id = r.role_id where u.status = 1 and r.status = 1 and u.user_name = #{userName};
